price: Say, “It is He Who has dispersed you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.”
arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
